name: ListVercelDeployments
description:
Retrieve deployments from Vercel for a user or team.

This tool fetches the list of deployments for the authenticated user or team from Vercel. It should be called when users need to view their recent deployment history. If a deployment is incomplete, the URL will be null.

parameters.name: deployment_name
parameters.description: The name of the deployment to filter results.

value_schema.description: Name of the deployment.

parameters.name: created_after_timestamp
parameters.description: Retrieve deployments created after this Date timestamp. Defaults to current time if not specified.

value_schema.description: Gets the deployment created after this Date timestamp. (default: current time)

parameters.name: maximum_deployments_to_list
parameters.description: Sets the maximum number of deployments to retrieve in one request.

value_schema.description: Maximum number of deployments to list from a request.

parameters.name: filter_by_project_id
parameters.description: Filter deployments using a specific project ID or name.

value_schema.description: Filter deployments from the given ID or name.

parameters.name: filter_by_project_ids
parameters.description: Filter deployments from specified project IDs. Cannot be used with the 'filter_by_project_id' argument.

value_schema.description: Filter deployments from the given project IDs. Cannot be used when projectId is specified.

parameters.name: filter_by_environment
parameters.description: Specify the environment to filter deployments (e.g., 'production', 'staging').

value_schema.description: Filter deployments based on the environment.

parameters.name: get_deployments_before_timestamp
parameters.description: A timestamp to get deployments created before a specific date. Useful for filtering older deployments. Defaults to the current time if not specified.

value_schema.description: Gets the deployment created before this Date timestamp. (default: current time)

parameters.name: user_filter
parameters.description: Filter deployments by the user who created them. Provide a username or user ID.

value_schema.description: Filter out deployments based on users who have created the deployment.

parameters.name: deployment_since_timestamp
parameters.description: Retrieve deployments created after this JavaScript timestamp.

value_schema.description: Get Deployments created after this JavaScript timestamp.

parameters.name: fetch_deployments_before_timestamp
parameters.description: Specify a JavaScript timestamp to retrieve deployments created before this time.

value_schema.description: Get Deployments created before this JavaScript timestamp.

parameters.name: deployment_state_filter
parameters.description: Filter deployments by their state, such as `BUILDING`, `ERROR`, `INITIALIZING`, `QUEUED`, `READY`, or `CANCELED`.

value_schema.description: Filter deployments based on their state (`BUILDING`, `ERROR`, `INITIALIZING`, `QUEUED`, `READY`, `CANCELED`)

parameters.name: branch_name_filter
parameters.description: Specify the branch name to filter deployments.

value_schema.description: Filter deployments based on the branch name

parameters.name: filter_by_sha
parameters.description: Filter deployments based on the specific SHA value.

value_schema.description: Filter deployments based on the SHA

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The identifier for the team to perform the request on behalf of. Use when filtering deployments by team.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The team slug to perform the request on behalf of. Specify which team's deployments to retrieve.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: filter_by_rollback_candidacy
parameters.description: Set to true to filter and include only rollback candidate deployments.

value_schema.description: Filter deployments based on their rollback candidacy

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Name of the deployment.

value_schema.description: Name of the deployment.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Gets the deployment created after this Date timestamp. (default: current time)

value_schema.description: Gets the deployment created after this Date timestamp. (default: current time)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of deployments to list from a request.

value_schema.description: Maximum number of deployments to list from a request.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Filter deployments from the given ID or name.

value_schema.description: Filter deployments from the given ID or name.

parameters.name: projectIds
parameters.description: Filter deployments from the given project IDs. Cannot be used when projectId is specified.

value_schema.description: Filter deployments from the given project IDs. Cannot be used when projectId is specified.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Filter deployments based on the environment.

value_schema.description: Filter deployments based on the environment.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Gets the deployment created before this Date timestamp. (default: current time)

value_schema.description: Gets the deployment created before this Date timestamp. (default: current time)

parameters.name: users
parameters.description: Filter out deployments based on users who have created the deployment.

value_schema.description: Filter out deployments based on users who have created the deployment.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Get Deployments created after this JavaScript timestamp.

value_schema.description: Get Deployments created after this JavaScript timestamp.

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Get Deployments created before this JavaScript timestamp.

value_schema.description: Get Deployments created before this JavaScript timestamp.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Filter deployments based on their state (`BUILDING`, `ERROR`, `INITIALIZING`, `QUEUED`, `READY`, `CANCELED`)

value_schema.description: Filter deployments based on their state (`BUILDING`, `ERROR`, `INITIALIZING`, `QUEUED`, `READY`, `CANCELED`)

parameters.name: rollbackCandidate
parameters.description: Filter deployments based on their rollback candidacy

value_schema.description: Filter deployments based on their rollback candidacy

parameters.description: Filter deployments based on the branch name

value_schema.description: Filter deployments based on the branch name

parameters.description: Filter deployments based on the SHA

parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.
